attributes.action: allow the Church of Scientology the religious status it deserves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Church of Scientology is a religious organisation dedicated to the betterment of individuals by allowing them to examine who they are, what they are and where they are.

Therefore, the British Government should allow the Church religious status as it has allowed to so many other religions countrywide.
